pages.text: $(li)The Hopper can be used to catch items that drops on it, and to transfer items into and out of containers.$(br)$(li)It can be used to craft a $(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/hopper_minecart)Minecart with Hopper$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).
$(li)It will stop to tranfer items when receives a redstone signal.
